text: The Maritime Alps ( ; ) are a mountain range in the southwestern part of the Alps. They form the border between the French region of Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur and the Italian regions of Piedmont and Liguria. They are the southernmost part of the Alps. ==Maps== * Italian official cartography (Istituto Geografico Militare - IGM); on-line version: www.pcn.minambiente.it * French official cartography (Institut Géographique National - IGN); on-line version: www.geoportail.fr Category:Mountains of Italy Category:Mountains of France
title: Maritime Alps
